ApiGatewayId.Description: The ID of the shared API Gateway resource

DynamoDBTableArn.Description: The ARN of the shared DynamoDB Table resource

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function

LambdaFunctionHandler.Description: The handler of the Lambda function

LambdaFunctionRuntime.Description: The runtime of the Lambda function

LambdaFunctionRole.Description: The IAM role for the Lambda function
